description: Welcome home to Heath West, a modern community of 67 homes proudly developed by BMG Real Estate. This 4 Bedroom, 3 full bath home features an open layout, large kitchen with beautiful Fischer & Paykel appliances incl. industrial style gas range, double drawer dishwasher. Oversized windows, high efficiency GAS furnace. Â FREE A/C + FREE W/D incl for limited time. Two car parking with double side by side garage! Finishes incl. slim shaker cabinets w/ quartz counters, covered deck w/ gas rough in, spacious master & spa inspired ensuite + many more special touches throughout! Heath West is located directly next to Donna Gabriel Robins elementary with a short walk to restaurants, parks and shopping.. Completion estimated end Feb 2026. Sales Centre & Showhome located at 7918 204B Street, Langley.
